attributes.action: INFLATION PAY AND EXPENSES INCREASES MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT  FOLLOWING PUBLIC SPENDING REVIEW
attributes.additional_details:
Following on from the public spending review of 26/06/2013 It is time for a 100% Guarantee from our Government to accept the cuts have to be universal in pubic sector and include all public staff including all Members of Parliament and the House of Lords
No independent review committees, No excuses about equal pay to the private sector (MPS ARE NOT IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR),just clear evidence that as stated previously "we are all in this together"  a decisive statement is needed without delay.
